photosearcher 1.0

User_info

Source: R/user_info.R
user_info.Rd

Takes user defined FLickr user ID and returns data regarding their profile. Uses the flickr.profile.getProfile API method from the Flickr API. See https://www.flickr.com/services/api/flickr.profile.getProfile.html for more information on the API method.

user_info(user_id = NULL, api_key = api_key)

Arguments

user_id

String, the id of the user you wihs to obtain information for.
api_key

String, if you have used the save_key function the api_key argument is automatically filled. If not api_key can be used optionally to supplying your API key if you do not wish for it to be saved in the environment or as a .Rda

Value

Dataframe of 18 variables from the searched users publically available infromation including; hometown and occupation. Full list of returned variables: id, nsid, join_date, occupation, hometown, showcase_set, showcase_set_title, first_name, last_name, profile_description, website city, country, facebook, twitter, tumblr, Instagram, pinterest

Details

Note: if this is the first function of the package and you do not enter you API key in the arguement api_key you use you will be prompted to enter your API key or save it using the save_key function. API keys are avialable from https://www.flickr.com/services/apps/create/apply. Using the save_key function will save your key as a .Rda file which can then be called to when using any other function.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
user_info(user_id = "8017836@N02")

user_info(user_id = c("11763518@N00", "39745335@N06", "104939923@N02"))
# }
